pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Joe Biden, Vice President of the United States of America | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Joe Biden, Vice President of the United States of America. 

The Prime Minister and the Vice President spoke about the importance of the Canada â€“ United States bilateral relationship, and discussed various issues of mutual interest.

The Prime Minister wished Vice President Biden the best of luck as he prepares to leave office.
